column5: This brand new rebuilt duplex in South Austin features a spacious living area, custom moulding, and beautiful concrete countertops and floors. Our place is close to The Indian Roller, The Moontower, Valentina's BBQ, multiple large city parks, and other South Austin restaraunts and hotspots. Only 15 minutes from downtown in a quiet neighborhood. Our place is good for any guest. We are very involved in the local culture and music scene and love to travel and give recommendations.
